winecidermead.name: Blackberry Wine
winecidermead.description: Sweet, tart, and irresistibly smooth — this blackberry wine is bursting with ripe berry flavor from start to finish. Each sip hits with a juicy pop of blackberry sweetness balanced by just the right touch of tangy tartness. Perfect for cozy fall evenings, dessert pairings, or anyone who loves a little fruit-forward flair in their glass.

winecidermead.name: Cardinal Rosé
winecidermead.description: Light, fruity blush‑colored rosé with strawberry notes—ideal for warm‑weather sipping.

winecidermead.name: Maple Mead
winecidermead.description: A Semi - Sweet Acerglyn Mead made from a blend of Tupelo Honey, Manuka Honey, Wildflower Honey, and Maple Syrup. It has delicate buttery, caramelized honey, maple, and oak tasting notes.

winecidermead.name: Bee City
winecidermead.description: Our flagship sparkling session mead made with WG Bee Farm's wildflower honey! It provides delicate tasting notes of sweet honey and floral undertones with an apple cider like finish! Name is in honor of both The City of Martinsville and The Town of Ridgeway being Bee City USA Affiliates.

winecidermead.name: Tupelo Mead
winecidermead.description: A Semi-Sweet Mead made with 100% Tupelo honey that has delicate buttery tasting notes with hints of citrus, floral, and rosewater undertones!

winecidermead.name: Gewürztraminer
winecidermead.description: Gewürztraminer is a highly aromatic German white wine known for its distinctive flavors of lychee, rose and tropical fruit, often with a hint of spice.

winecidermead.name: Orange Blossom Mead
winecidermead.description: A mead made from Orange Blossom honey that has tasting notes of sweet honey and citrus upfront with floral undertones and a warming complex alcohol in the finish!

winecidermead.name: Orchard Drive
winecidermead.description: Our Flagship cider made with a blend of Macintosh and Granny Smith Apples. Crisp and refreshing, it highlights both the tartness and the sweetness of the apples.

winecidermead.name: Plum Cider
winecidermead.description: A cider made with a blend of Macintosh and Granny Smith Apples. Crisp and refreshing, it highlights both the tartness and the sweetness of the apples plus the additions of plum puree give it a sweet and tart candy like taste!

winecidermead.name: Maple Wine
winecidermead.description: A Sweet Maple Wine that has delicate tasting notes of maple, oak, and slightly floral and woody undertones! Made from 100% Grade B Maple Syrup!

winecidermead.name: Wildflower Mead
winecidermead.description: A Sweet Mead that has delicate tasting notes of sweet honey with hints of citrus, sweet fruits, and slightly floral and honeysuckle undertones. Made from 100% wildflower honey from WG Bee Farm.

winecidermead.name: Raspberry Chocolate Mead
winecidermead.description: A Sweet Pyment Mead that has delicate tasting notes of sweet honey, raspberries, and chocolate!

winecidermead.name: Liebfraumilch
winecidermead.description: Liebfraumilch is a semi sweet German White Wine, known for being light to medium bodied with fruity flavors like peach, pear, and apple, and a hint of honeysuckle!

winecidermead.name: White Cranberry
winecidermead.description: A unique blend of white cranberry and Pinot Gris that’s crisp, slightly tart, and fruit forward. This wine is smooth, light-bodied with a subtly sweet finish and a clean succulent taste.

winecidermead.name: 2024 Viognier
winecidermead.description: Named Virginia's official state grape in 2011, Viognier is a white wine grape made famous in the Rhone Valley of France. The floral aromas and lush character suggest some sweetness but the wine is finished dry. You may notice some peach or golden pear on the nose. It is a perfect pairing for spicy or salty foods - perhaps Thai or curry. Silver Medal Winner at the Virginia Governor's Cup.

winecidermead.name: 2024 Old Virginia Red
winecidermead.description: Old Virginia Red continues to be a crowd pleaser - smooth, light and great with food. The 2024 vintage features 100% Chambourcin.

winecidermead.name: 2022 Merlot
winecidermead.description: Estate Merlot, blackberry notes, aged in oak for a smooth toffee finish

winecidermead.name: 2024 Traminette
winecidermead.description: Estate grown, new vintage released September 2025, semi-sweet, floral nose with notes of apricot
